Meta-Workflow Miao YU 2016-11-13 Chapter 1 Introduction This is a workflow book written in Bookdown. You could contribute it by a pull request. R and Rstudio are the softwares needed in this workflow. The software package used for metabolomics data analysis is xcms The workflow of the metabolomic study always began with data collection and ended with certain scientific problem. It always showed the following workflow: Project Setup Experimental design(DoE) Raw data pretreatment Peaks selection Omics analysis Common analysis methods for metabolomics Demo
